title: Apple launches standalone optional silver-and-black Magic Trackpad, Magic Keyboard, and Magic Mouse
content:
While announcing the new Studio Display, Apple said it’s launching a standalone optional silver-and-black Magic Trackpad, Magic Keyboard, and Magic Mouse.

more…

The post Apple launches standalone optional silver-and-black Magic Trackpad, Magic Keyboard, and Magic Mouse appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While announcing the new Studio Display, Apple said it's launching a standalone optional silver-and-black Magic Trackpad, Keyboard, and Mouse.
